articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Don't expect human life expectancy to grow much more, researcher says - VOA Asia
articles.description: Medical advances, genetic research aren’t translating into overall jumps in lifespans
articles.content:
new york  Humanity is hitting the upper limit of life expectancy, according to a new study.
Advances in medical technology and genetic research not to mention larger numbers of people making it to a… [+3658 chars]
